flawed_nl_solution:
A total of 10*2=<<10*2=20>>20 students went on the field trip.
Some chaperones showed up, letting the group grow to 20+5=<<20+5=21>>21 individuals.
The teachers had to come as well, making the group as big as 21+2=<<21+2=23>>23 individuals.
When the school day ended, 23-10=<<23-10=13>>13 individuals were left.
A couple of chaperones followed suit, leaving 13-2=<<13-2=11>>11 people at the zoo.
#### 11

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 25, not 21. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
